name: new_ios_apps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool app_store.
Tool description: Unofficial Apple App Store Api
API description: Fetch a list of new iOS apps from the App Store using the RapidAPI service.

country.description: The country code for the App Store. Defaults to 'us'.

category.description: The category code for the type of apps. Defaults to '6016'.

lang.description: The language code for the App Store content. Defaults to 'en'.

num.description:
Number of results to return. 
Default: 50
Max: 200
